system.notes: Very Rare for Orks. Human's should not use this. Overloads on a 15 or lower. When it overloads it ceases functioning for 1d5 rounds and inflicts 1d10+5 Energy Damage with 0 Penetration and Shocking Quality to everyone within 2d10 metres, including wearer [AP: 50%]
